original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 327/330 against the US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were steady and the rupee closed at 327/330 against the US dollar in the spot market on Thursday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 31.25/30 percent on Thursday, steady from 31.25/30 percent on Wednesday.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 28.80/85 percent, steady from 28.25/29.00 percent on Wednesday.
Sri Lanka rupee closed at 327/330 rupees against the US dollar, from 328.50/329.50 rupees from a day earlier. (Colombo/ March30/2023
